https://tmrev.io/movie/795066-Dear Fellini 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The film is based on the events of Rasim (Rasim Jafarov), a literature teacher who came to Baku from the village to become a movie director. There he meets Leyla, a beautiful woman who he falls in love with. She calls him Fellini in honor of Italian film director Federico Fellini. Dear Fellini
